typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{"national_provider_identifier"|"last_name/organization_name_of_the_provider"|"first_name_of_the_provider"|"middle_initial_of_the_provider"|"credentials_of_the_provider"|"gender_of_the_provider"|"entity_type_of_the_provider"|"street_address_1_of_the_provider"|"street_address_2_of_the_provider"|"city_of_the_provider"|"zip_code_of_the_provider"|"state_code_of_the_provider"|"country_code_of_the_provider"|"provider_type"|"medicare_participation_indicator"|"place_of_service"|"hcpcs_code"|"hcpcs_description"|"hcpcs_drug_indicator"|"number_of_services"|"number_of_medicare_beneficiaries"|"number_of_distinct_medicare_beneficiary/per_day_services"|"average_medicare_allowed_amount"|"average_submitted_charge_amount"|"average_medicare_payment_amount"|"average_medicare_standardized_amount"|"year"} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	skipLines: 1) ~> PhysicianCompare
